snippet.title: Shorewood PNC branch embraces 'green' features
snippet.description: Banks and green - as in "cash" - always have gone together. But today a growing number of banks are linked to another kind of green, as in "environmentally friendly." Banks and green - as in "cash" - always have gone together. But today a growing number of banks

snippet.title: Sony's wares at CES
snippet.description: Sony Electronics dumped a whole bunch of product announcements last night as part of its Consumer Electronics Show extravaganza, including: new personal internet viewers; 3-D HD Cyber-shot cameras; HD Handycam camcorders; 3-D "Bloggie" pocket cameras; BRAVIA LCD HDTVs; Blu-ray disc players and home theater systems; wireless HomeShare

snippet.title: Bond movies have beat do-or-die odds for 50 years
snippet.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) Over the last 50 years, the owners of the James Bond movie franchise have had heart-stopping crises as thrilling as the ones that face their fictional secret agent. They've nearly gone bust more than once and have come close to losing all of their rights
